code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useContext}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{AuthContext}from"../context/AuthContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function UserBookedSlots(){const[bookedSlots,setBookedSlots]=useState([]);const context=useContext(AuthContext);const backendAPI=process.env.REACT_APP_BACKENDAPI;useEffect(()=>{const fetchUserBookings=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(backendAPI,"/api/booking/user/").concat(context.user.user.id));setBookedSlots(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching user bookings:",error);}};fetchUserBookings();},[context.user.user._id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"allcentres",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"heading",children:"Your Booked Slots"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-container",children:bookedSlots.length>0?bookedSlots.map(booking=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:booking.courtId.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-location",children:booking.centerId.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-date",children:new Date(booking.date).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-slot",children:["Slot: ",booking.bookingSlot]})]},booking._id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"no-bookings",children:"No Bookings Found."})})]});}
